
We have produced a set of percentiles in the pipeline for getting PIP data into OWID.

Here we take the file from GitHub.
```{r}

pip_perc_orig<- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/owid/notebooks/main/BetterDataDocs/JoeHasell/PIP/data/ppp_2017/raw/percentiles.csv')

```


```{r}
write.csv(pip_perc_orig, "PhD_pages/data/pip_percentiles.csv.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
